subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The game was halted for 1 hour 13 minutes in the bottom of the fourth inning, but starter Hiroki Kuroda came back out in the fifth, and Mariano Rivera earned his 30th save.
snippet: The game was halted for 1 hour 13 minutes in the bottom of the fourth inning, but starter Hiroki Kuroda came back out in the fifth, and Mariano Rivera earned his 30th save.
